Uniswap

Constant Product Trading

class uniswappy.cpt.factory.UniswapFactory(name: str, address: str)

Create Uniswap liquidity pools for given token pairs

Parameters

self.namestr

Token name

self.addressstr

Token 0 name

self.exchange_from_tokendictionary

Map of tokens to exchanges

self.tokens_from_exchangedictionary

Map of exchanges to pair tokens

Deploy a Uniswap liquidity pool (LP) exchange

Parameters

Uniswap exchange initialization data

Returns

exchangeUniswapExchange

Newly created exchange that is also a LP token

quote(amountA, reserveA, reserveB)

Given amount asset and reserves, return equivalent amount of other asset

amountAfloat

amount of a given asset token

reserveAfloat

total amount of asset A in LP

reserveBfloat

total amount of asset B in LP

Indexing

class uniswappy.cpt.index.RebaseIndexToken

Determine rebase amount of index token given a certain amount of liquidity from LP (inverse of SettlementLPToken)

apply(lp, tkn, liq_amt)

Apply rebase token calculation settlement; given liquidity amount, what is the reserve amount

Parameters

lpUniswapExchange

Uniswap LP

tkn: ERC20

Token asset from CPT pair

liq_amt: float

Liquidity amount to be priced in in terms of reserve token

Returns

rebase_amount: float

Reserve token amount, given liquidity amount

class uniswappy.cpt.index.SettlementLPToken

Determine settlement amount of LP token given a certain amount of token

apply(lp, tkn, itkn_amt)

Apply LP calculation settlement; given token amount, what is the liquidity amount

Parameters

lpUniswapExchange

Uniswap LP

tkn: ERC20

Token asset from CPT pair

itkn_amt: float

Token reserve amount to be priced in terms of liquidity

Returns

lp_amount: float

Liquidity amount given reserve token amount
